text: Bastiaan Johannis "Bas" van der Vlies (29 June 1942 â€“ 7 November 2021) was a Dutch politician and teacher. He was a member of the Reformed Political Party (SGP). He was their party leader between 1986 until 2010. He was also a member of the House of Representatives from 1981 until 2010. Van der Vlies was born in Sliedrecht, Netherlands.
